description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物与商界高管，中国共产党党员。历任习酒董事长、习酒集团董事长，后于2024年出任贵州茅台集团党委书记、董事长。同时也是第十三届全国人民代表大会代表。
description.en: A Chinese politician and business executive, and a member of the Communist Party of China. He has served as Chairman of Xijiu and Chairman of Xijiu Group, and in 2024 became the Party Secretary and Chairman of Kweichow Moutai Group. He is also a delegate to the 13th National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关。
description.en: The highest state authority of the People's Republic of China.

zh-cn: 中国贵州茅台酒厂（集团）有限责任公司

description.zh-cn: 中国贵州省的一家大型国有企业，以生产茅台酒而闻名。
description.en: A large state-owned enterprise in Guizhou Province, China, famous for producing Moutai liquor.

zh-cn: 贵州茅台酒股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 贵州茅台集团旗下的上市公司。
description.en: A listed company under the Kweichow Moutai Group.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国贵州省的一所高等教育机构，后并入贵州大学。
description.en: An institution of higher education located in Guizhou Province, China, later merged into Guizhou University.

description.zh-cn: 中国贵州的一个白酒品牌和公司，曾为茅台集团子公司。
description.en: A Baijiu brand and company in Guizhou, China, formerly a subsidiary of Moutai Group.

description.zh-cn: 由原茅台集团子公司习酒公司为基础组建的酒业集团。
description.en: A liquor group established based on the former Moutai Group subsidiary, Xijiu Company.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物与商界高管，张德芹在贵州茅台集团董事长的职务前任。
description.en: A Chinese politician and business executive, the predecessor of Zhang Deqin as Chairman of Kweichow Moutai Group.

description.zh-cn: 根据职务继任信息，其为张德芹在贵州茅台集团董事长的继任者。
description.en: According to succession information, he is the successor to Zhang Deqin as Chairman of Kweichow Moutai Group.

description.zh-cn: 就读于轻工系发酵工程专业。
description.en: Studied in the Department of Light Industry, majoring in Fermentation Engineering.

position.zh-cn: 党委副书记、董事长、总经理
position.en: Deputy Party Secretary, Chairman, General Manager

description.zh-cn: 在担任习酒董事长期间，通过推出窖藏1988、君品习酒等产品，成功将习酒打造成高端品牌。
description.en: During his tenure as Chairman of Xijiu, he successfully developed Xijiu into a high-end brand by launching products such as Jiaocang 1988 and Junpin Xijiu.

relationships.target: 第十三届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 张德芹接替丁雄军出任贵州茅台集团董事长。
description.en: Zhang Deqin succeeded Ding Xiongjun as Chairman of Kweichow Moutai Group.

description.zh-cn: 根据职务继任信息，陈华将接替张德芹担任贵州茅台集团董事长。
description.en: According to succession information, Chen Hua is expected to succeed Zhang Deqin as Chairman of Kweichow Moutai Group.

description.zh-cn: 信息来源于维基百科分类“北京大学校友”。
description.en: Information sourced from the Wikipedia category 'Peking University alumni'.

description.zh-cn: 信息来源于维基百科分类“西北大学校友”。
description.en: Information sourced from the Wikipedia category 'Northwest University (China) alumni'.

description.zh-cn: 信息来源于维基百科分类“中欧国际工商学院校友”。
description.en: Information sourced from the Wikipedia category 'China Europe International Business School alumni'.
